item.title: Starting Clojure, as a Common Lisp Deveoper
item.description: I have started to get into clojure again. This is just a spot for me to take notes for now. I’ll turn this into a post that is mostly notes to myself about the basics of clojure, but also comparing it to what I know about common lisp. So sort of a “clojure from a common lisp developer”. This might be the first post of a series…
